overview_of_class:
This class will provide students with the tools necessary to pitch, develop, and write an original television episode. Current television pilot pick-ups will be read and analyzed.

At times, class will replicate as much as possible the atmosphere of the "writers' room" on a sitcom during production. As with a real sitcom staff, the class will offer constructive criticism of one anothers work. The various roles in the writer's room will also be explored.
name: Writing the TV Episode
title: SoC RTVF 563-0-20 Writing the TV Episode
